tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Srinivas Priya Hospital is an family run Maternity Hospital, by Mother (Rajeshwari Jayaraman) and Daughter (Raja Priya Ayyappan) both are very humble doctors and takes care of their patients well. it also has various other joint pain section manage by her son (Srinivasan).
It has very good Ambience and Nurses are cooperative and helpful, however has strict 1 attendee policy and management policy of not locking the doors from inside which makes our privacy in stake inspite paying huge amount for private rooms.
Cleanliness is their top priority i understand that but AC's and Restrooms amenities are not maintained well some are broken.
I don't know what's the role of HR (Vijaya Shankari - that's what night duty sister told who bought phone call of her) indulging in rude conversation with old age attendees looking after an Caesarean women. I beleive HR role is to look after staff payroll not poke their nose into others privacy. She is not fit to be in Hospitality industry or else hospital name might get spoil because of her behaviour. 5 Star was reduced to 4 star because of her rude behaviour and conversation with my mother-in-law.

Dr. Rajapriya Ayyappan is an amazing doctor, got to know through one of my close pharma friend. After a brief research we chose to consult her for maternity. Sheâ€™s clear, confident in her communication and easy to approach kind of doctor. She answers most of your questions with adequate amount of patience and has a good sense of humour to knock you down for super silly questions. My wife Narmadha had natural birth and we have a beautiful angel in our arms. I would always be thankful to such skilled doctors. 
Cons - Admin staff has to improve a lot in terms of their work, ability, speed and accuracy.  Pricing is decent and affordable.

context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,
review:
I have got an issue in my 6th month of pregnancy and my family doctor was in a dialoma to abort the baby then we consulted Dr.Rajapriya and she said only one word that is "TRUST ME I WILL KEEP A BEAUTIFUL BABY IN YOUR HAND" as so I delivered a beautiful healthy 3kg girl baby.
                    my humble request to all the ladies who is facing issues in pregnancy to get pregnancy, go and consult her SHE will stand as a solution.

I got appointment for Dec 10, 2018 @ 10.30am. Its 12pm now and we are not at all receiving response from hospital employees.... Have to ask Nurse for two to three times to check my wife's weight.... Go to srinivasan priya hospital only if u know the medical procedures..... Or else definitely they are not gonna help you
No proper response from the staff. Only the doctor is good. Staff has no knowledge about anything. Less staff also
